birth_context.metadata: 1970s: Munich felt oil shocks, stagflation or state expansion, and social realignment alongside integration and welfare‑state recalibration; locals commonly emphasized pragmatism, extended family safety nets, and informal hustles and civic rules, unions, and cultural heritage pride.

formative_context.metadata: 1970s: Mexico City felt oil shocks, stagflation or state expansion, and social realignment alongside oscillating populism and economic volatility; locals commonly emphasized pragmatism, extended family safety nets, and informal hustles and tight‑knit kinship and street‑level solidarity.

1970s: Nairobi felt oil shocks, stagflation or state expansion, and social realignment alongside postcolonial nation‑building and urban informal economies; locals commonly emphasized pragmatism, extended family safety nets, and informal hustles and extended family obligations and church/mosque‑centered community.

current_socio_demographics.societal_perceptions: as a middle-class immigrant professional in Russia, cultural expectations emphasize stability and traditional family roles; stigma around mental health remains

presenting_problem.summary: adjusting to relocation and work pressure after moving from Nairobi to Saint Petersburg
